subject: Re: [junit] clone()
msgSnippet: ... I have a wish, too.  When you change the public API, please deprecate the old calls, don t just delete them.  Please? I upgraded to Junit 3.3.1, then
messageBody:
On Wed, 17 Jan 2001, David Corbin wrote:

> The next time someone is making changes to JUnit, could said person add
> clone() implementations to the various implementations of Test? It
> would be handy for some thing I'm doing....

I have a wish, too. When you change the public API, please
deprecate the old calls, don't just delete them. Please?

I upgraded to Junit 3.3.1, then backed it out again because everything
I have calls now-missing LoadingTestRunners! I have a whole bunch of
stuff automated, and it all broke. :(

--
Joi Ellis Software Engineer
Aravox Technologies joi@..., gyles19@...

No matter what we think of Linux versus FreeBSD, etc., the one thing I
really like about Linux is that it has Microsoft worried. Anything
that kicks a monopoly in the pants has got to be good for something.
- Chris Johnson
